name: Insurance School Recruiting Analytics

tools.description: Get the number of new student enrollments today across all insurance courses

tools.name: leads_today
tools.description: Get the total number of new leads captured today from all sources

tools.name: qualified_leads
tools.description: Get count of qualified leads ready for enrollment consultation

tools.name: enrollment_breakdown
tools.description: Get detailed enrollment statistics broken down by course type (2-15, 2-40, 2-14)

tools.name: revenue_today
tools.description: Get total completed payment revenue for today across all payment plans

tools.name: agent_performance
tools.description: Get average AI agent confidence score over the last 24 hours

tools.name: call_summary

tools.name: license_types

tools.name: recent_activity

tools.name: conversion_rate
